GSD.description:
ALSA: emu10k1: Fix out of bounds access in snd_emu10k1_pcm_channel_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 39a90720f3abe96625d1224e7a7463410875de4c. For more details please see the references link.
